mapper.select: select * from board order by num desc
select * from board where title like #{title}
select * from board where title=#{title} and num not in (#{num})
select * from board where title like CONCAT('%',#{searchData},'%') order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into board values ((select ifnull(MAX(num)+1, 1) from board b),#{title},#{content},#{name},now())
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, name=#{name}, regdate=now() where num=#{num}
